verbs.description: The former Florida deputy who [V: was] labeled a " coward " after the Parkland shooting broke his silence about President Donald Trump 's comments . Trump had vehemently criticized the deputy , Scot Peterson , for failing to confront the gunman who killed 17 students and staff members .
